conditioning_exercises.name: Box Jumps
conditioning_exercises.description: Explosive lower body exercise. Jump onto a 20-24 inch box with both feet.

conditioning_exercises.name: Lateral Bounds
conditioning_exercises.description: Lateral explosiveness drill. Bound side to side, landing on single leg.

conditioning_exercises.name: Medicine Ball Slams
conditioning_exercises.description: Full-body explosive movement. Slam medicine ball to ground from overhead.

conditioning_exercises.name: Shuttle Runs
conditioning_exercises.description: Quick directional change drill. Sprint between two points 10-20m apart.

conditioning_exercises.name: Sled Push
conditioning_exercises.description: Drive through legs to push weighted sled 20-40 meters.

conditioning_exercises.name: High-Knee Runs
conditioning_exercises.description: Drive knees high while running in place or forward. Focus on quick turnover.

conditioning_exercises.name: Ladder Drills
conditioning_exercises.description: Various footwork patterns through agility ladder for quick feet.

conditioning_exercises.name: Medicine Ball Rotations
conditioning_exercises.description: Rotational power exercise. Throw medicine ball against wall with rotation.

conditioning_exercises.name: Assault Bike Intervals
conditioning_exercises.description: High-intensity cardio on assault bike. Sprint intervals with rest.

conditioning_exercises.name: Burpees
conditioning_exercises.description: Full-body conditioning. From standing, drop to pushup, jump back up.

conditioning_exercises.name: Jump Squats
conditioning_exercises.description: Explosive squat variation. Jump as high as possible from squat position.

conditioning_exercises.name: Battle Ropes
conditioning_exercises.description: Wave heavy ropes with alternating or simultaneous arm movements.

conditioning_exercises.name: Broad Jumps
conditioning_exercises.description: Jump forward for maximum distance from standing position.

conditioning_exercises.name: Kettlebell Swings
conditioning_exercises.description: Hip-hinge explosive movement swinging kettlebell to shoulder height.

conditioning_exercises.name: Mountain Climbers
conditioning_exercises.description: From plank position, drive knees to chest alternating quickly.

conditioning_exercises.name: Tuck Jumps
conditioning_exercises.description: Jump vertically bringing knees to chest in mid-air.

conditioning_exercises.name: Prowler Push
conditioning_exercises.description: Push weighted prowler sled forward with low body position.

conditioning_exercises.name: Cone Drills (5-10-5)
conditioning_exercises.description: Sprint pattern: 5 yards right, 10 yards left, 5 yards right (20 yards total).

conditioning_exercises.name: Farmer's Walk
conditioning_exercises.description: Walk with heavy weights in each hand maintaining posture.

conditioning_exercises.name: Rowing Machine Intervals
conditioning_exercises.description: High-intensity intervals on rowing machine for cardiovascular conditioning.

conditioning_exercises.name: Depth Jumps
conditioning_exercises.description: Step off box, land, immediately jump vertically as high as possible.

conditioning_exercises.name: Agility T-Drill
conditioning_exercises.description: Sprint forward, shuffle right, shuffle left, shuffle back to center, backpedal.

conditioning_exercises.name: Sled Drag
conditioning_exercises.description: Pull weighted sled backwards or walk forward while dragging.

conditioning_exercises.name: Wall Balls
conditioning_exercises.description: Squat with medicine ball, explode up, throw ball to wall target, catch and repeat.

conditioning_exercises.name: Sprint Intervals
conditioning_exercises.description: Maximum effort sprints (30-60m) with full recovery between reps.
